comment:
Wait! what? How? Why? 
No 😨 bro what the actual feck? Not cool at all! He must be under her spell or something! I thought you were cool Jason 😞 Jason she is manipulating you like she did with Johnny and other survivours 😞 I totally understand you aren't really wanting to get into the drama but PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE BRO! OPEN YOUR EYES, maybe even organise a sit down with Johnny Depp and ask him about what's been going on! I totally understand you don't want to deal with this issue but you are being manipulated my friend! JASON please wake up and actually listen to what is really going on! Don't be naive when it comes to this woman, she is a narcissistic, manipulative, controlling, abusive and extremely sadistic woman! Even her parents have gone against her and defended Johnny Depp! That's a major red flag! Don't be a victim to her! Wake up Jason please! You're a very talented and amazing person but bro don't be naive, especially around Amber Heard because she is playing you! 
Dude I am so happy Australia doesn't want her in our Country! 🇭🇲🇭🇲🇭🇲 YESSSS! 

I'm not hating on Jason whatsoever man, he is probably just trying to avoid all this controversy around Amber Heard (maybe he don't to lose his role either but no one will watch it if he does stick up for her). I don't know, I believe she is playing him like she is his puppet master! I mean she will do anything to keep her roles in Hollywood but girl, no one wants you there! Go! Be gone! Give up! You mess with Johnny Depp, you mess with all of us! Now you're trying to play the poor victim card with Jason and he seems like the type to just go with the flow, stay out of drama and controversy but yeah dude please please open your eyes brother! That's all I'm saying okay! You will eventually see the truth but you need to start really looking into this case okay! I love you as an actor but just be careful because you can end up just like Johnny Depp and bro as much of an amazing actor you are! Johnny Depp is definitely one of the most talented actors of all time 😂 I mean she was an idiot even to try go against him! Amber girl, you tripping mate!

Sorry this comment is so long! I'm just...............my head hurts with this woman! She ain't no Samara Weaving, Margret Robbie, Reese Witherspoon, Cameron Diaz, Anna Faris, Anna Hathaway, Scarlett Johansson, Nicole Kidman, Jennifer Lawrence etc you get the idea 😂😂😂
